definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

sentences.english: This article systematically introduces the skyscraper bioclimatic design approach.
sentences.chinese: 系統地介紹了高層建築的生物氣候學設計方法。

sentences.english: Research gaps exist in studies on climatology and climate and weather forecasting, " he says.
sentences.chinese: 在氣候學和氣候與天氣預報的研究之間也存在差距。

sentences.english: The potential evapotranspiration is an important characteristic value in climatology.
sentences.chinese: 蒸發力是氣候學上的一個重要特徵量。

sentences.english: The climatology method is another simple way of producing a forecast.
sentences.chinese: 氣候學方法是另一種製作天氣預報的簡單方法。

sentences.english: The Lotus leaf has been selected as organic and bio-climatic metaphor for proposal.
sentences.chinese: 我們選擇“白睡蓮”作爲有機學和生態氣候學的比喻。
